```{r ug.gd clean class and recode}
#str(ug.gd)
#ls<-ug.gd%>%group_by(Program)%>%count();View(ls)#no NA
#ug.gd[is.na(ug.gd$`Cum Credits`),]#a lot of NAs, all comes from UG 21 fall!
#ug.gd[is.na(ug.gd$`Birth Date`),]#find many, come from different file
ug.gd<-ug.gd%>%mutate(`FT/PT`=factor(`FT/PT`),
                      `Transfer YN`=factor(`Transfer YN`,labels =c("Transfer","Non-transfer"),levels = c("Y","N")),
                      
                      #"no" college attend="new", "yes" college attend="return"
                      `New Ret Term YN`=case_when(`New Ret Term YN`=="N"~"new",`New Ret Term YN`=="NEW"~"new",`New Ret Term YN`=="Y"~"return",`New Ret Term YN`=="RET"~"return",`New Ret Term YN`=="RETS"~"return"),
                      `New Ret Term YN`=factor(`New Ret Term YN`,levels = c("new","return")),
                      
                      Ethnicity=if_else(Ethnicity=="Non Resident Alien/International","Non Resident Alien",Ethnicity),
                      Ethnicity=factor(Ethnicity, levels=c("Non Resident Alien","Hispanic","American Indian or Alaska Native","Asian","Black or African American","White","Two or more Races","Race and Ethnicity Unknown")),
                      Gender=factor(Gender,levels = c("M","F","U")),
                      
                      `Term Credits`=as.numeric(`Term Credits`),
                      `Cum Credits`=as.numeric(`Cum Credits`),
                      `Birth Date`=mdy(`Birth Date`),
                      
                      Level=factor(Level,levels = c("UG","GD")),
                      term=factor(term,levels = c("21summer2","21fall","22winter","22spring","22summer.1main")),
                      degree.t=factor(degree.t))
#all cols are either factor (with correct values and orders), numeric, or stay as character (id without NA)

write.xlsx(ug.gd,file="/Volumes/lasellshare/Faculty_Staff_Shares$/IR/Surveys/IPEDS/2022-2023/Fall Collection/12-month enrollment/ug.gd_21-22.xlsx")
```



```{r ipeds cleaning FT/PT Attend}
#remove not needed cols
ipeds<-ug.gd%>%select(-`Cum Credits`,-Program,-`gov id`,-`Birth Date`)%>%
  unique()%>%arrange(`People Code Id`)

ipeds%>%group_by(term)%>%count()
###investigate duplicated ppid: it's b/c FT/PT, new/return, term credits, term
#dup.id<-ipeds[duplicated(ipeds$`People Code Id`),]
#ipeds[ipeds$`People Code Id` %in% dup.id$`People Code Id`,]%>%arrange(Level,`People Code Id`)

###########keep one for duplicated ids
#FT/PT: determined by students' first full term at Lasell--eric said just whatever fall term value is

sts.fall<-ipeds%>%group_by(`People Code Id`)%>%
  mutate(attend=if_else(term=="21fall",as.character(`FT/PT`),"No fall"))%>%
  filter(attend%in%c("FT","PT"))%>%arrange(`People Code Id`)

sts.spring<-ipeds%>%group_by(`People Code Id`)%>%
  filter(! `People Code Id`%in% sts.fall$`People Code Id`)%>%
  mutate(attend=if_else(term=="22spring",as.character(`FT/PT`),"No spring"))%>%
  arrange(`People Code Id`)%>%
  filter(attend%in%c("FT","PT"))

sts.summer2<-ipeds%>%group_by(`People Code Id`)%>%
  filter(! `People Code Id`%in% c(sts.fall$`People Code Id`,
                                  sts.spring$`People Code Id`))%>%
  mutate(attend=if_else(term=="21summer2",as.character(`FT/PT`),"No sum2"))%>%
  arrange(`People Code Id`)%>%arrange(`People Code Id`)%>%
  filter(attend%in%c("FT","PT"))

sts.summer1<-ipeds%>%group_by(`People Code Id`)%>%
  filter(! `People Code Id`%in% c(sts.fall$`People Code Id`,
                                  sts.spring$`People Code Id`,
                                  sts.summer2$`People Code Id`))%>%
  mutate(attend=if_else(term=="22summer.1main",as.character(`FT/PT`),"No sum1"))%>%
  arrange(`People Code Id`)%>%
  filter(attend%in%c("FT","PT"))
  
sts.winter<-ipeds%>%group_by(`People Code Id`)%>%
  filter(! `People Code Id`%in% c(sts.fall$`People Code Id`,
                                  sts.spring$`People Code Id`,
                                  sts.summer2$`People Code Id`,
                                  sts.summer1$`People Code Id`))%>%
  mutate(attend=if_else(term=="22winter",as.character(`FT/PT`),"No winter"))%>%
  arrange(`People Code Id`)%>%
  filter(attend%in%c("FT","PT"))

sts<-plyr::join_all(list(sts.fall,sts.spring,sts.summer2,sts.summer1,sts.winter),type ="full" )%>% 
  select(`People Code Id`,attend)%>%
 unique()%>%arrange(`People Code Id`)#2057

ipeds<-plyr::join_all(list(ipeds,sts),type="left")%>%
  select(-`FT/PT`)%>%
  unique()%>%arrange(`People Code Id`)
```


```{r ipeds cleaning NewRet}
#new/return (new/return in the FALL): equals to whatever FALL TERM values
ret1<-ipeds%>%#group_by(`People Code Id`)%>%
  mutate(NewRet=if_else(term=="21fall",as.character(`New Ret Term YN`),"No fall"))#same type for TRUE and FALSE

ret2<-ret1%>%filter(NewRet=="No fall")%>%
  mutate(NewRet=if_else(term=="22winter",as.character(`New Ret Term YN`),"No winter"))
  
ret3<-ret2%>%filter(NewRet=="No winter")%>%
  mutate(NewRet=if_else(term=="22spring",as.character(`New Ret Term YN`),"No spring"))

ret4<-ret3%>%filter(NewRet=="No spring")%>%
  mutate(NewRet=if_else(term=="21summer2",as.character(`New Ret Term YN`),"No summer1"))

ret5<-ret4%>%filter(NewRet=="No summer1")%>%
  mutate(NewRet=if_else(term=="22summer.1main",as.character(`New Ret Term YN`),"No summer22"))

ret<-plyr::join_all(list(ret1,ret2,ret3,ret4,ret5),type ="full" )%>% 
  select(`People Code Id`,NewRet)%>%
  filter(NewRet %in% c("new","return"))%>%
  unique()

ipeds<-plyr::join_all(list(ipeds,ret),type="left")%>%unique()#  %>%select(-`New Ret Term YN`)

ipeds%>%select(-`FT/PT`,-`New Ret Term YN`)%>%unique()%>%arrange(`People Code Id`)
```
